attributes.action: Istruct society to make David Mitchell of the Peep Show, the next "spoof" Bond
attributes.additional_details: Life as we know it has been irrevocably detached whilst forcing our voices to go fully into our heads. The conscious self is being eroded by the pressure cooker that exists in modern UK. The HoP should discuss what strategies, and more specifically, this strategy to overcome boundaries we have both self inflicted and systemically attached. The UK Gov should stand firm in this culturally significant moment, and place the particular individual in a position to make real change, a real impact.
attributes.background: Discuss the necessity in the gloom of 2020, to install a key, societally significantly modern personality into the culturally symbolic of British Culture role, James Bond. There is a burning desire to unite through first person perspective humour and the uk population needs happiness legislating.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government aren't responsible for the issue you raise.
